End-User License Agreement (EULA)

IMPORTANT — PLEASE READ THIS AGREEMENT CAREFULLY

This agreement governs the use of the software product titled “DPC Word Automation”
(“Software”). By installing or using the Software, you agree to these terms.

1. License Grant
   You are granted a non-exclusive license to:
   • Install and use the Software on supported Windows devices
   • View and modify the provided source code strictly for internal use
   • Build and deploy the Software only for your organization’s needs

2. Ownership
   All intellectual property rights remain with the Developer.  
   Distribution or resale of the Software or modified versions to third parties
   is not permitted without prior written approval.

3. Included Source Code
   Source files are provided to allow future maintenance, customization,
   and bug fixes by the organization’s technical team.  
   The Developer is not responsible for issues arising from unauthorized or
   incorrect modifications.

4. Support & Updates
   The Developer will provide:
   • Software updates and improvements
   • Technical support during troubleshooting
   for a **limited period of __ months** from the delivery date  
   (Support duration can be updated per mutual agreement).

5. Data Responsibility
   The user is solely responsible for the security, backup, and accuracy
   of any data processed by the Software.

6. Warranty Disclaimer
   The Software is provided “as-is.” While the Developer will make reasonable
   efforts to fix issues during the support period, no guarantee is made that
   the Software will be free from defects.

7. Limitation of Liability
   The Developer shall not be held liable for any indirect, incidental,
   or consequential damages resulting from the usage of the Software.

8. Termination
   This license will terminate if the user fails to comply with the terms.
   Upon termination, the Software must be uninstalled and all copies destroyed.

If you do not agree with the terms of this agreement, do not install or use the Software.

© 2025 DPC Word Automation — All Rights Reserved.
